qa_pairs.question: To which control standard does the GA - HORIZON SIDE ENTRY BOL ACCESS FITTING, WITH ANGLED FLUSH DISC HOLDER conform?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Verifies the correct control standard is provided: CONTROL STANDARDS NACE MR0175. Case-sensitive.
qa_pairs.answer: The GA - HORIZON SIDE ENTRY BOL ACCESS FITTING, WITH ANGLED FLUSH DISC HOLDER conforms to CONTROL STANDARDS NACE MR0175.

qa_pairs.question: Where can the material information be found for size C of the CONTROL STANDARDS NACE MR0175?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Correctly identifies that the material information is linked to drawing number ADD23091201_Rav, sheet 1 of 1, and size C of CONTROL STANDARDS NACE MR0175. Incorrect if drawing number, sheet number, or size are wrong.
qa_pairs.answer: The material information for size C of the CONTROL STANDARDS NACE MR0175 is located on sheet 1 of 1 of drawing number ADD23091201_Rav.
